page.title: 14PETS SURVEY
page.content: The majority of the children who live in the block of Bowdon kept{fish, but we found that some children didn't have any{pets}at all. It is quite obvious that children who lived near,or on, main roads wouldn't have {cats}or{dogs}and other people kept animals like gerbils and rabbits. Most people who kept animals mainly kept more than one animal. The strangest{pet}we found in our survey was a horse. While other people had more common{pets}like{dogs, cats and rabbits. We realized that the people who didn't have any{pets}at all would either not like them, or have someone in their family who was allergic to them.
